Posts.Content: Remember to take your calcium and vitamin d.as it gives you low bone density.i went off it after one yearThen went on arimidex same thing now on phosomax celebrex and nexium to help with the bone density problem created by femarawent off arimidex alsoThen tried aromasin  went off all of them after getting cancer back same side of the mastectomy 3 times .flying solo with god now.......and feeling much better .hang in girl eventually it does get better
Posts.Title: BONE AND MUSCLE PAIN WITH FEMARA
